og.description: As has happened the last three years, 2014 has kicked off with a cheap horror film  being the lone new release of the weekend. Heck, going back to 2005 with Michael Keaton's White Noise ($24 million opening/$91m worldwide), having a major new horror fim kick off the new year has been a [...]
